article: vice president al gore and secretary of state madeleine albright over the weekend sharply denounced george w. bush 's proposal to end the role of u.s. ground troops in the international peacekeeping mission in the balkans , saying that his idea could lead to regional instability and even the dissolution of nato .
abstract: bush under fire for his irresponsible balkans plan
